NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Information systems or technology strategic review and planning services

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C01

TI_TEXT.P: Услуги по стратегически анализ и планиране на компютърни системи и информационни технологии
Informační systémy nebo technologické strategické revize a plánování
Strategisk gennemgang og planlægning af informationssystemer eller -teknologi
Strategische Prüfung und Planung im Bereich Informationssysteme oder -technologie
Υπηρεσίες στρατηγικής αναθεώρησης και προγραμματισμού συστημάτων ή τεχνολογίας των πληροφοριών
Information systems or technology strategic review and planning services
Servicios de planificación y revisión estratégica de sistemas de información o de tecnología de la información
Infosüsteemide ja tehnoloogilise strateegia retsenseerimis- ja planeerimisteenused
Tietojärjestelmien tai tietotekniikan strategiset arviointi- ja suunnittelupalvelut
Services d'analyse stratégique et de planification de systèmes ou de technologies de l'information
Information systems or technology strategic review and planning services
Usluge strateške revizije i planiranja na području informacijskih sustava ili tehnologije
Információs rendszer és technológia stratégiai felülvizsgálatával és tervezésével kapcsolatos szolgáltatások
Servizi di revisione strategica e programmazione di sistemi o tecnologie dell’informazione
Informacijos sistemų arba technologijos strateginės peržiūros ir planavimo paslaugos
Informācijas sistēmu vai tehnoloģijas stratēģiskā pārskata un plānošanas pakalpojumi
Servizzi tas-sistemi ta' l-informatika jew ta' reviżjoni u ppjanar strateġiku tat-teknoloġija
Strategie- en planningsdiensten voor informatiesystemen of -technologie
Usługi w zakresie systemów informacji lub strategicznej analizy technologicznej oraz usługi w zakresie planowania
Serviços de planeamento e de análise estratégica em matéria de sistemas ou de tecnologias da informação
Servicii de analiză strategică şi de planificare a sistemelor sau a tehnologiei informaţiilor
Strategické prehodnotenie a plánovanie informačných systémov alebo technológie
Storitve strateške revizije in načrtovanja na področju informacijskih sistemov ali tehnologij
Strategisk granskning och planering av informationssystem eller informationsteknik

TITLE.P: WSCC ADO Market Engagement Event — Review of the Technology Enabled Lives Strategy for West Sussex County Council

SHORT_DESCR.P: Market Engagement Event The Council recognises the importance of engaging with qualified providers of Technology Enabled Care and those developing innovative technologies and values the important contribution the sector can make to service design. West Sussex County Council will therefore be holding a market engagement event to test its approach to the procurement of a new Technology Enabled Lives service with the wider sector, which we would like to invite you to attend. This will:
— provide a forum to allow the sector to influence the design of the delivery model and service,
— enable all parties to engage and develop ideas in a collaborative manner,
— help us to identify any potential gaps in the sectors capabilities that may affect service outcomes,

— give the Council assurance that its proposed service model is both feasible and deliverable in the current market conditions and that there are enough providers in the market for a competitive procurement. We hope the enclosed information will allow you to ascertain an understanding of the outcomes we need to achieve with the Technology Enabled Lives Service and allow you time to consider and prepare for the event should the opportunity be something your organisation would be interested in. Attendees, Parking and Information The event will be held in Committee Room 3 on 19.2.2018 between 9:30 am and 2:00 pm at County Hall, West Street, Chichester, PO19 1RG. The Council’s website provides a link to County Hall travel directions: https://www.westsussex.gov.uk/find-my-nearest/council-office/

You will need to provide the names of all attendees via the Intend portal so that details are registered at our main reception. On arrival, you and/or your colleagues should report to the main reception at County Hall where a Council representative will meet and escort you to the venue. Unfortunately there is no parking available on-site, however there are several public car parks within a few minutes’ walk of County Hall, as detailed below: http://www.chichester.gov.uk/carparkmap

Following the event you will be offered an opportunity to book a 1:2:1 appointment for more detailed discussions if wanted. Planned dates for these are 26th February and 1.3.2018. You will also be able to put any questions about the event and the procurement approach through Intend which will result in a written response. If you would like to participate in this event please notify us via the Intend portal by the 12th of February. We look forward to meeting you on the 19th February.

Please note: This is not the start of a procurement process. A separate contract notice will be published to cover this requirement. Organisations who take part in this event will not have any advantage over those who do not. Similarly organisations not taking part in the consultation will not be disadvantaged.
